text: Hideki Konno (born May 13, 1965) is a video game director, designer, and producer who works for Nintendo. Since 2015, Konno has worked on Nintendo’s Smart Device Group, the department responsible for the company’s smartphone games. Some of the most well known projects Konno has worked on include the Mario Kart and parts of the Super Mario series, the Nintendo 3DS, both of the Nintendogs games, and two of the Luigi’s Mansion games.
